poem:
Title: "An Ode to Forgotten Symphony"

Franck's notes, a grizzled pasture, rebirth untimely,
In bicentennial's sweep, echoes yearn still. 
Opera of the lost, left to languor.
"Hulda" calls, from Bru Zane's ancients, caged. 
Chromatics bite, gnarled climax rises, recoils.
No masterpiece, they claim, yet sings! 
In her spirited vestiges, the cryptic quiver,
An orchestration of resilience, of the unheard.
